name: Dagger
description: A small, sharp blade used for stabbing. It is easy to conceal and quick to draw.

name: Healing Potion
description: A small vial filled with a mysterious liquid that glows faintly. When consumed, it restores a small amount of health.

name: Helmet
description: A hardened leather helmet that protects from blows to the head. It is lightweight and comfortable to wear.
